snippet: Judge Lucy H. Koh of Federal District Court in San Jose, Calif., rejected an earlier offer of $324.5 million for the workers affected by the case.
abstract: Federal Judge Lucy H Koh gives tentative approval to $415 million settlement in class-action suit filed by workers against Apple, Google, Intel and Adobe Systems of illegal agreement over hiring one another's employees.
lead_paragraph: Judge Lucy H. Koh of Federal District Court in San Jose, Calif., rejected an earlier offer of $324.5 million for the workers affected by the case.

headline.print_headline: Higher Settlement Is Closer in Silicon Valley Hiring Case
headline.main: Higher Settlement Is Closer in Silicon Valley Hiring Case
